scenario:
If you raise up a 100g apple through 1m from a low table to your mouth, how many people would need to raise up similar apples in 1s to expend power at a rate of 1 killowatt?
Where:
Force due to gravity, F = 10 newtons per kilogramme;
x = distance in metres;
Work done in joules, W = F.x;
Power in watts, P= dW/dt
